name: @spacedevin/react-mui-pro-multi-range-picker
description: Multi-range date picker Pro component for Material-UI with drag-to-select and chip management

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types
scripts.build:esm: tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --module esnext --outDir dist/esm && echo '{"type":"module"}' > dist/esm/package.json && mv dist/esm/index.js dist/index.mjs
scripts.build:cjs: tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --module commonjs --outDir dist/cjs && mv dist/cjs/index.js dist/index.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test:release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.dev: npm run demo:sync && cd examples/demo && npm start
scripts.demo:build: npm run demo:sync && cd examples/demo && npm run build

author: Your Name
